ThingDef.label: tongue
ThingDef.description: A biological tongue. The fleshy muscular organ for tasting and articulating speech. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: upper arm
ThingDef.description: A biological human upper arm. Part of arm that lets you work and carry stuff. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: elbow
ThingDef.description: A biological human elbow. Part of arm that lets you work and carry stuff. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: forearm
ThingDef.description: A biological human forearm. Part of arm that lets you work and carry stuff. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: wrist
ThingDef.description: A biological human wrist. Part of arm that lets you work and carry stuff. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: hip
ThingDef.description: A biological human hip. Part of leg that lets you move around. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: thigh
ThingDef.description: A biological human thigh. Part of leg that lets you move around. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: knee
ThingDef.description: A biological human knee. Part of leg that lets you move around. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: lower leg
ThingDef.description: A biological human lower leg. Part of leg that lets you move around. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: ankle
ThingDef.description: A biological human ankle. Part of leg that lets you move around. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: spleen
ThingDef.description: A biological human spleen. Acts as a filter for blood on the body. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: thymus
ThingDef.description: A biological human thymus. Acts as a filter for blood on the body. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: pancreas
ThingDef.description: A biological human pancreas. Digests food and turns it into energy. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: large intestine
ThingDef.description: A biological human large intestine. Digests food and turns it into energy. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: small intestine
ThingDef.description: A biological human small intestine. Digests food and turns it into energy. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: mesentery
ThingDef.description: A biological human mesentery. Digests food and turns it into energy. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: bladder
ThingDef.description: A biological human bladder. Hollow muscular organ that stores urine. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: gallbladder
ThingDef.description: A biological human gallbladder. Stores bile produced by the liver to help digestion of fats in food. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: larynx
ThingDef.description: A biological human larynx. Involved in breathing and required for talking. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: esophagus
ThingDef.description: A biological human esophagus. The first components of the digestive system. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: trachea
ThingDef.description: A biological human trachea. A tube that connects the larynx to the lungs. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: bronchus
ThingDef.description: A biological human bronchus. A passage of airway in the respiratory system that conducts air into the lungs. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.
